name: Neighbor’s Creepy Granny House
description:
Spend five horrors spooky night at granny creepy house to find out the truth. Play the best games for grannies in the creepy house and solve the puzzle of scared crazy mystery granny neighbor. Creepy granny was killed by his greedy wealthy family so she came back to take revenge in creepy grannies games.First of all enter into the neighbor’s creepy granny house while she is walking in the garden, Find bloody weapons from the house and read magic books to capture the spirit of granny and bring peace into the town

Features For Neighbor's Creepy Granny House
- Enter into the Creepy Granny House
- Spend Five Horror Spooky Night at Granny House
- Find the bloody weapons from the basement
- Read Magic Books to learn the Magic
- Capture Scary Horror Granny Spirit in Bottle

Download Fun For Free!
